meanings.definition: A benign tumor composed of fibrous tissue, typically found in the uterus.
meanings.sent1: The doctor discovered a fibroid during the routine check-up.
meanings.sent2: She had surgery to remove the fibroid from her uterus.
meanings.sent3: The fibroid in her uterus decided to throw a party, but it was benign and no one showed up.
meanings.sent4: The fibroid grew like a stubborn weed in the garden of her uterus.
meanings.sent5: The fibroid, a benign tumor, was as unwelcome as a raincloud on a sunny day.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a fibroid.
meanings.sent1: The fabric had a fibroid texture, similar to that of a benign tumor.
meanings.sent2: Her skin felt fibroid, like it was made of fibrous tissue.
meanings.sent3: The fibroid pattern on the wallpaper seemed to be winking at her.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness was as fibroid as the growth in her uterus.
meanings.sent5: The fibroid resemblance was so striking, it was hard to ignore.
